original: Brunnander, Karl, överingenjör, Norrköping, f. 26/11/87 i Örby, Älvsb. 1., av August B. o. Elisabeth Janson. G. 15 m. Willy Ekdahl. — Avg:ex. fr. CTI h. avd. (M) 09. Anst. v. Utan-sjö sulfitfabr. 10, i USA 11-12, konstr. o. driftsing. v. A-B Kväveindustri i Gbg 13-17, dir. v. A-B Hedenros Konstsmide i Gbg 18, tekn. dir. v. A-S Skand. Ing :byrå i Köpenhamn 19, fabr :chef v. Litograf A-B i Norrköp. sed. 20. Fd. led. av stadsfullm., drät-selkamm., v. ordf. i fastigh :avd., led. av hälsov:ndn, arb :lösh :komm. o. skatteavskrivn :komm., verkst. styr:-medl. f. Kalbo arb :hem, fd. sekr. i Norrköp. polytekn. fören. Res. t. USA, Danm., Norge, Tyskl., Engl., Holl., Belg. o. Frankr.
translated: Brunnander, Karl, chief engineer, Norrköping, born November 26, 1887 in Örby, Älvsborgs län, son of August B. and Elisabeth Janson. Married in 1915 to Willy Ekdahl. Graduated from the Technical Institute H. Department (Mechanical) in 1909. Employed at the Utansjö sulfite factory in 1910, in USA from 1911-1912, as a design and operating engineer at A-B Nitrogen Industry in Gothenburg from 1913-1917, director of A-B Hedenros Konstsmide in Gothenburg in 1918, technical director of A-S Skand. Ing :byrå in Copenhagen in 1919, factory manager of Litograf A-B in Norrköping since 1920. Former member of the City Council, Finance Committee, vice chairman of the Real Estate Department, member of the health board, unemployment committee, and tax depreciation committee, executive board member for Kalbo work home, former secretary of the Norrköping Polytechnic Association. Traveled to USA, Denmark, Norway, Germany, England, Holland, Belgium and France.
